column11:
Ministry of Economy approval required new vehicles only. Avoid giving the client the group activity as it requires approval from MOE. - MOE approval is needed for a showroom where the client walks in a views the cars and possibly purchases the car on locations, the client cannot have a showroom with our free zone license. - You can give the client all the activities from within the group that do not require MOE approval such as (used cars trading, used cars trading for export, new cars trading for export) - MOE approval is generally needed only for New Cars sold in the UAE. - If the client opts to obtain a warehouse they can do so with an NOC however the warehouse cannot be a showroom, and must be used for storage only. Expert Insights: Approval Requirements
MOE Pre-approval needed for
:
New car sales within UAE
Showroom operations
Walk-in customer sales
No approval needed for
:
Used car trading
Used cars for export
New cars for export
Client Guidance Strategy
Avoid group activity
: Automatically includes MOE approval requirement
Recommend specific activities
: Select non-approval activities from the group
Warehouse clarification
: "Can get warehouse with NOC but cannot use as showroom - storageonly"
Banking & Operations
Storage solutions
: Contract with storage companies rather than renting warehouse
Sales platform
: List cars on Dubizzle or develop own platform
Showroom restriction
: "If Dubai Municipality finds showroom setup in warehouse, you are fucked"

column11:
Commercial brokerage means that the client will be the middleman between the seller / manufacturer of goods and the buyer of said goods.The client will earn their income from the percentage of the sale made between the 2 parties that they linked.The advantage of this activity is that the client does not need approval to be the mediator for trading goods that require 3rd party approval since the relevant approval should be with the license of the (Seller / Manufacturer) this allows for flexibility to deal with more difficult products.Under this the client can put orders to import goods however, the order has to be directed to the buyer and not the client’s company. Sometimes clients might intend to do the same activity but under general trading so it is useful to clarify whether the client will be the middleman or the direct trader. Adding a general trading activity with commercial brokerage, gives a very flexible license for trading operations. Commercial brokerage services is a difficult activity to open a bank account with. Expert Insights: Business Model
Role
: Middleman between seller/manufacturer and buyer
Income
: Commission percentage from completed sales
Import process
: Orders directed to buyer, not broker's company
Strategic Advantages
Regulatory Flexibility
:
No approval needed for regulated goods mediation
Seller/manufacturer holds required approvals
Broker facilitates without taking product ownership
Combined Strategy
:
"Adding general trading activity with commercial brokerage gives very flexible license for tradingoperations"
Banking Challenge
Major difficulty
: "More difficult than general trading" for bank account opening
Reason
: Banks concerned about liability and money laundering risks
Verification process
: Must clearly demonstrate legitimate brokerage model
Client Consultation Questions
1.
"Are you trading (buying then selling) or earning commission only?"
2.
"Will you import goods under your company or client's name?"

If client's name

column11:
Best advised to avoid general trading if possible if the client does not know what they intend to trade, as they will struggle to clarify their business plan during bank account opening.  If the client has a few specific items they wish to trade, like construction materials or Food and Beverage then suggest those activities instead of General Trading and leverage the 3 business groups package. If the client has too many areas of trade in mind then give them General Trading to combine all the activities.  General trading is considered a high risk activity but it is not impossible as it is the 2nd most popular license in Meydan FZ, however banks don’t favor this activity due to its non specificity.  If the client is still concerned about General Trading then you can suggest to them to pick any other activity and once they obtain a bank account, amend the license to add general trading back for 2000 AED. This can also leverage a multi year license with a 15% discount since a 2 year license gives 1 free license amendment to cover up for the yearly renewal. The client can utilize said amendment any time. Expert Inisghts: Strategic Approach
Primary Recommendation
: Avoid general trading if possible and guide clients toward specific activities
Key Challenges & Solutions
Banking Difficulties
Problem
: Banks consider general trading high-risk due to non-specificity
Impact
: Banks "don't know exactly what you are trading" and will "dig deeper"
Solution
: Recommend specific activities within the 3 business groups package
Client Consultation Process
Step 1: Understand Specific Products
Always ask: "What exact products are you intending to trade under general trading?"
Example response: "Plastic materials, toys, wooden goods"
Step 2: Recommend Specific Activities
Suggest: "wholesale of toys, wholesale of plastic materials, wholesale of wood"
Explain: "These three activities will cover all your needs and make banking easier"
Step 3: Address Future Expansion Concerns
Client concern: "What if I want to trade something else later?"
Response: "You can add activities later for 2000 AED license amendment + 1000 AED per activity"
Alternative: "Or you can pick general trading now, but banking will be more challenging"
When General Trading is Appropriate
Client has 5-6 different product groups (more economical than individual activities)
Client genuinely unsure about specific products
Client willing to accept banking challenges for flexibility
Regulated Products Under General Trading
Cannot Trade Even with General Trading:
Gold, diamonds, precious metals (requires CERA approval)
Oil (requires DOPA approval)
Any regulated goods must be specifically listed and approved
Can Trade Under General Trading:
Food, household goods, clothes
Steel, metals (except precious metals)
Construction materials, everyday use items
Special Considerations
High-risk nationalities
: Combining with general trading creates additional banking difficulties
Business plan requirement
: Client must provide detailed business plan to banks
Workaround strategy
: "Pick another activity, get bank account, then amend to add general tradingfor 2000 AED"
Advanced Strategy: Multi-Year License Leverage
2-year license includes 1 free amendment (15% discount)
Client can start with easier activity, then use free amendment for general trading
Covers yearly renewal cost while providing flexibility

column11:
This activity is extremely easy to issue, for all sorts of IT services. If the client plans to host an application then they can add another related activity which is also easy to issue due to the low risk 6310.00 Data Processing, Hosting And Related Activities; Web Portals. Expert Insights: Activity Selection Logic
Two main IT categories
:
1.
6200.00
: Programming, development, software creation
2.
6310.00
: Data processing, hosting, web portals
Decision Framework
Choose 6200.00 when
:
"We're developing an AI"
"We're developing software"
Cybersecurity consultancy
Server management (can overlap with 6310)
Choose 6310.00 when
:
"There's a portal and they're hosting something"
"You can go on portal, check out items, do something"
Web hosting services
Combined Approach
:
Often selected together for comprehensive IT services
Low risk activities, easy to issue
Examples
AI development projects
Custom software creation
Cybersecurity services
Computer architecture consulting

column11:
This activity should be the only one on the license and is best not combined with any other activity so that the client can utilize the benefit of this activity. The purpose of a holding company is simply to own assets or other companies. Holding companies are not subject to corporate tax since they receive their profit via dividends from the assets that they own, since income from dividends is already taxed. That’s why it is not combined with any service or commercial activity. Expert Insights : Strategic Structure
Exclusive activity
: Should be the only activity on license
Purpose
: Own shares in other companies or assets
Tax advantage
: No tax on profits (already taxed at subsidiary level)
Operational Model
No commercial transactions
: Just ownership and benefit collection
Profit distribution
: Subsidiaries transfer profits to holding company
Example structure
: "Dubai Holding owns 100 companies - shareholders split Dubai Holdingownership"
Real Estate Strategy (Advanced)
Creative Approach for Property Investment
:
1.
Holding company purchases properties anywhere in UAE
2.
Sign agreement with real estate management company
3.
Management company handles leasing, Ejari, operations
4.
Profits split between holding company and management company
5.
Advantage
: Can own property outside MFZ jurisdiction
Important Disclaimer
:
Present as suggestion requiring client verification
"I think it's possible to do this. My suggestion is to consult with real estate management company"
Avoid taking liability for creative structures

column11:
Management Consultancy allows the client to provide any type of consultation that does not require third party approvals. However, it does not include financial or investment consultancy as those are in the Financial category and not in the Professional category. Expert Insights: Scope & Limitations
Includes
: Any type of consultation that doesn't require third-party approvals
Excludes
: Financial or investment consultancy (belongs in Financial category)
Gray Area Handling
: Strategic budget planning allowed, but not "invest here, invest there" advice
Common Client Scenarios & Responses
Multiple Consultancy Types
Client mentions: "Immigration consultancy, public relations, project management, health consultancy"
Response
: "Pick management consultancy - everything else is included in this group"
Advantage
: Acts as umbrella activity for various consultancy services
Gray Area Navigation: Engineering/Design Consultancy
Problem
: Engineering design requires Dubai Municipality approval and engineer qualifications
Solution Strategy
:
Position as advisory role: "You can authorize blueprints as a company"
Client consultation model: "When clients ask 'is this blueprint good?' you can advise"
Outsourcing approach: "Take blueprint to actual engineering company for certification"
Key point
: "You're not actually certifying anything" - avoids approval requirements
Immigration vs Educational Consultancy
Educational Consultancy Confusion
:
Clients think: "Advise students on curriculum"
Reality: Educational consultancy is B2B (school to consultant)
Requires approval: 15,000 AED
Solution
: Reframe as immigration consultancy
"We're going to advise which university to pick and assist with immigration"
Alternative: "Employment placement agency - sending to university, finding employment later"
Important
: Always disclose gray area risks to client

column11:
Tour Operator activities comes hand in hand with 7911.00 Travel Agency (DCAA Approval). The difference is that the travel agency can sell tickets directly while tour operator will have to go through a travel agency such as (Skyscanner / Wizzair) to book the flight tickets for the client. Approval for DCAA is 6,500 AED and the PRO service is 1,100 AED with a corporate letter 250 AED that will be required for the approval. Expert Insights: Regulatory Framework
Two related activities
:
1.
7911.00 Travel Agency
: Requires DCAA approval (6,500 AED + 1,100 AED PRO service)
2.
7912.00 Tour Operator
: No approval needed
Key Distinction
Travel Agency
: Can sell airline tickets directly
Tour Operator
: Must book through approved agencies (Skyscanner, Wizair)
Operational Strategies
Approval Avoidance Strategy
List tours on website without selling tickets directly
Include links to DCAA-approved sites for ticket purchases
Focus on tour packages rather than ticket sales
Desert Safari Operations
Public Areas
:
Requires Dubai Municipality permit
"Best practice is to get permit and operate"
Private Property
:
No permits required
"Nobody's going to ask questions"
Mainland Event Challenges
Jurisdiction restriction
: Tour operator license limited to free zone
Solution
: Partner with mainland permit holders
Cost consideration
: Permit fees vs. partnership arrangements

column11:
If the events take place in Mainland then the client can only provide the event through a third party venue such as a hotel. If the events take place in other free zones then there are no issues. Expert Insights: Jurisdiction Management
Within MFZ
: No restrictions
Full operational freedom
All event types permitted
Mainland Operations
: Restricted approach required
Venue Strategy
:
Must use third-party venues (hotels)
Hotel provides venue, collects payments
Event organizer gets commission/fee
Cannot
: Rent property directly under company name
Permit Requirements
:
Dubai Municipality permit for public properties
Private property: Coordinate with property owner
Example
: "Even camping as individual for more than 2 days needs permit"
Payment Collection Challenges
Problem
: Cannot collect payments at mainland locations
Solutions
:
1.
Hotel collects, transfers organizer's portion
2.
Online ticket sales (no address attachment)
3.
Contract-based fee arrangements
Wedding Organizing
Specific activity available under arts category
Can be included under general events organizing
Same jurisdiction rules apply
Business Boundary Management
Important Principle
: "We are not feasibility consultants. We're just license issuing authority"
Scope
: Provide licensing information and requirements
Not scope
: Business operation details, accounting advice
Response to operational questions
: "How you run your business is none of our business"

The required permits must be obtained from the (Commercial & events permit department – DBLC ) when organizing the event by applying to the electronic permits system online through (Commercial & events permit department – DBLC) or by visiting the (Commercial Permits Department at the Department of Economy and Tourism.

This class includes provision of the type of education that lays the foundation for lifelong 
learning and human development and is capable of furthering education opportunities. 
Such units provide programmes that are usually on a more subject-oriented pattern using 
more specialized teachers, and more often employ several teachers conducting classes in 
their field of specialization. Education can be provided in classrooms or through radio, 
television broadcast, Internet, correspondence or at home.
Subject specialization at this level often begins to have some influence even on the educational experience of those pursuing a general programme. Such programmes are designated to qualify students either for technical and vocational education or for entrance 
to higher education without any special subject prerequisite.

column12: A healthcare facility provides residential treatment for people recovering from addiction as part of continuum of care for effective treatment. It is characterised by a high level of psychological and social intervention at a critical stage of recovery.  Residential treatment is most effective when people are immediately discharged from an in-patient hospital unit, or when their addiction symptomology requires a low level of assisted withdrawal and when abstinence is a goal of treatment. In addition residential treatment is most valuable where there is polydrug misuse, co-occurrence of substance misuse and mental illness or complex social and relationship issues.
